verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> that <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1209>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, they that were <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1252>contended<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,
<S%G3004%G3754>Saying<s%>, Thou wentest <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G203%G2192>uncircumcised<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G4906>eat<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> rehearsed the matter from the <S%G756>beginning<s%>, and <S%G1620>expounded<s%> it by <S%G2517>order<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2445>Joppa<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G1611>trance<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3705>vision<s%>, A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G2597>descend<s%>, as it had <S%G5613>been<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3607>sheet<s%>, let <S%G2524>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> by <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G746>corners<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G891>even<s%> to <S%G1700>me<s%>:

<S%G1519>Upon<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> when I had fastened mine <S%G816>eyes<s%>, I <S%G2657>considered<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> fourfooted <S%G5074>beasts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> wild <S%G2342>beasts<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G450>Arise<s%>, <S%G4074>Peter<s%>; <S%G2380>slay<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%>, Not <S%G3365>so<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>nothing<s%> <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G1525>hath<s%> at any <S%G3763>time<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1537%G1208>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>, that <S%G2840>call<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2840>common<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> was <S%G1096%G1909>done<s%> three <S%G5151>times<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> were drawn <S%G385>up<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1824>immediately<s%> there <S%G2186>were<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G1824>already<s%> <S%G2186>come<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1722%G3739%G3739>where<s%> I <S%G2252>was<s%>, <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2036>bade<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> go <S%G4905>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1252>doubting<s%>. <S%G1161%G2532>Moreover<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G4862%G2064>accompanied<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G435>man's<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>:

<S%G5037>And<s%> he <S%G518>shewed<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, which <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G649>Send<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2445>Joppa<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> call <S%G3343>for<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>, whose surname <S%G1941>is<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>;

<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall <S%G2980>tell<s%> <S%G4314%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%>, <S%G1722%G3739>whereby<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>, the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5618%G2532>as<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> remembered <S%G3415>I<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G5613>how<s%> that he <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>.

<S%G1487>Forasmuch<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the <S%G2470>like<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> he did unto <S%G2254>us<s%>, who <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547%G1161>Christ<s%>; <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, that I <S%G1415>could<s%> <S%G2967>withstand<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, they held their <S%G2270>peace<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G686>Then<s%> <S%G1325>hath<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2534>also<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

¶ <S%G3767%G3303>Now<s%> they which were scattered <S%G1289>abroad<s%> <S%G575>upon<s%> the <S%G2347>persecution<s%> that <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%> <S%G1330>travelled<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G5403>Phenice<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, <S%G2980>preaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> to <S%G3367>none<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> unto the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2953>Cyprus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2956>Cyrene<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%>, when they were <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G1675>Grecians<s%>, <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>, and <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3056>tidings<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G846>things<s%> <S%G191>came<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they sent <S%G1821>forth<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, that he should <S%G1330>go<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.

<S%G3739>Who<s%>, when he <S%G3854>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, was <S%G5463>glad<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%>, that with <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> they would cleave <S%G4357>unto<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> was <S%G4369>added<s%> unto the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5019>Tarsus<s%>, for to <S%G327>seek<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that a <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> assembled <S%G4863>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%>. <S%G5037>And<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G5537>called<s%> <S%G5546>Christians<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.
¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2718>came<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G13>Agabus<s%>, and <S%G4591>signified<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that there should <S%G3195%G1510>be<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>dearth<s%> <S%G1909>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%>: <S%G3748%G2532>which<s%> came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> in the days <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G846>man<s%> according <S%G2531>to<s%> his <S%G2141%G5100>ability<s%>, <S%G3724>determined<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1248>relief<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> which <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> they <S%G4160>did<s%>, and sent <S%G649>it<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>.
